name: Autobahn Police Simulator 2: Switch Edition
storyline:
Begin by setting up your character at the police station base and take on a broad range of missions including high speed car chases, securing accident scenes and much more. Each successful operation you complete will move you up the ranks.

You can choose from a free play option, or a spectacular story told in 20 missions, whatever you choose to play each mission is extensively voiced to convey a realistic and thrilling experience.
summary: An exciting career awaits you In Autobahn Police Simulator 2 for Nintendo Switch. Patrolling the German autobahns – arguably Europe’s busiest roads- is not for the fainthearted as you battle to maintain speed restrictions, track down drugs traffickers and manage road traffic incidents.
